thread.section_title: Travelgenio Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Travelgenio | travelgenio.de | 2 von 46
thread.title: Morgan

author: Morgan
title: Morgan
text: Trying to book a flight for my mother in law and they say her payment was declined. Tried their link for payment and never was able to confirm. Tried calling their service line 4 times. Each time put on hold for 6+ minutes, then someone just hangs up. WASTE OF TIME. No way to reach them and her flight was booked for tomorrow. This is the last time I will book using this agency.
